member.name: T:ApiAuthorization.Plugin.ApiAuthorizationSettings
member.summary: Settings which affect how ApiAuthorization is configured and used.

member.name: T:ApiAuthorization.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.ApiAuthorizationTimingsSubMenu
member.summary:
Returns a list of current Timings and can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: M:ApiAuthorization.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.ApiAuthorizationTimingsSubMenu.Data
member.summary: Returns Timings data in milliseconds for time spent processing by ApiAuthorization.Plugin.

member.name: T:ApiAuthorization.Plugin.PluginInitialisation
member.summary: Implements IPlugin which allows the ApiAuthorization.Plugin module to be loaded as a plugin module
